title: China’s Yuan Climbs Past 7 Per Dollar as PBOC Caves in to Bulls
description: The yuan climbed past the psychological milestone of 7 per dollar for the first time since September 2024, on bets China’s central bank will allow gradual currency appreciation to boost market confidence.
content: The yuan climbed past the psychological milestone of 7 per dollar for the first time since September 2024, on bets China’s central bank will allow gradual currency appreciation to boost market confidence.
